GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
PIRACY.
M/V ATTACKED BY PIRATES IN 04-49N 008-18E
AT 021900Z JUN. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP
CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
PHONE: 603 2031 0014, FAX: 603 2078 5769,
E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG, PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
